page.title: 04The Swimming Pool Experience
page.content: As they arrived at the turnstile they identified themselves to the custodian. The competitors went to the preparation area,the spectators took up their seats in the arena. The competitors were seen to be apprehensive, the crowd were in an expectant mood. Would their hero be victorious today? There were five in the first group.The small boy was crying. It was his first time in the arena. Would he be brave? His arms looked swollen above the elbow and they were orange in colour. Would he survive the first wave? The little girl beside him held his hand. "We're in this together Billie. Don't cry." They were all cold. The spectators had taken away nearly all the chldren's clothes. No shoes, no socks, no woolly jumpers; even their shirts, blouses and vests had gone! What is this? It is their first swimming lesson!!!!!
